title: INote.IGetFontInfo
description: Gets with the note's font information.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of doubles (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Currently this method returns only a line type index. See
swLineTypes_e
for line type index information.
